title: Mountain Master
description: High-performance mountain bike with a lightweight aluminum frame, 29-inch wheels, and a 12-speed drivetrain. Perfect for tackling challenging off-road trails.

title: City Cruiser
description: Stylish and comfortable city bike designed for urban commuting. Features a step-through frame, fenders, and a rear rack for carrying your belongings.

title: Road Racer
description: Carbon fiber road bike built for speed and efficiency. Equipped with a Shimano 105 groupset, aerodynamic frame, and lightweight wheels.

title: Kids' Bike
description: A fun and durable bike specially designed for children. Comes with training wheels and vibrant colors.

title: Electric Commuter
description: An electric bike perfect for daily commuting. Features a powerful motor, long-lasting battery, and integrated lights.

title: Gravel Grinder
description: Versatile bike built for gravel riding. Wide tires, disc brakes, and a sturdy frame ensure a smooth and stable ride on various terrains.

title: Hybrid Explorer
description: A hybrid bike that combines the best of road and mountain bikes. Ideal for both on-road and light off-road adventures.

title: Folding Commuter
description: A compact and foldable bike for easy storage and transportation. Perfect for city dwellers with limited space.

title: BMX Freestyle
description: A trick bike designed for BMX freestyle riders. Built to withstand jumps, stunts, and grinds at the skate park.

title: Touring Adventure
description: A touring bike for long-distance adventures. Comes with pannier racks, comfortable saddle, and durable components.
